title: The Halloween Show! + Week 8 Matchups, Candy Comps - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/29
description:
Happy Halloween! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 8 matchup breakdowns, injury updates, and more! Plus, a recap of the epic Packers vs Cardinals game, and a new edition of “Fantasy Faceoff!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 29th, 2021.
  
 (03:35) - Quick Question - Halloween Candy
 (07:55) - FootClan Friday
 (08:55) - Thursday Night Recap
 (15:35) - NFL News
 (25:40) - Fantasy Forecast
 (26:05) - Patriots at Chargers
 (30:45) - Jaguars at Seahawks
 (34:50) - Washington Football Team at Broncos
 (40:55) - Buccaneers at Saints
 (46:50) - Cowboys at Vikings
 (52:30) - Giants at Chiefs
 (56:50) - Fantasy Faceoff
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

 SimpliSafe

 Support this podcast 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
